labels.shortDescription: I confirm that the cover is less than 8 years old. I understand and accept the c
labels.value: I confirm that the cover is less than 8 years old. I understand and accept the condition.

labels.shortDescription: I will have in on hand product
labels.value: I will have it on hand

Trévi offers luxury opening service. The swimming pool has a cover aged 8 years or less.This option requires 2 additional visits at opening and includes: emptying the pool, washing the liner, step and crowning. The customer must fill the pool up to the first step at the bottom. The technician will return to collect his equipment. The pool must then be completely filled by the customer in order to proceed with the opening. Please note that an additional fee of $35/bag will be applied for bags of leaves/waste that will be removed from the pool.

1. Lower water level ($100 extra for the town of Mount-Royal) 2. Remove diving board, ladder and lights 3. Drain the pump, the filter, the chlorinator, brominator, salt system, or ozonator 4. I confirm that I have read the terms and conditions

4 - Magasin Trévi inc. will place the equipment removed during winterizing where indicated by the customer but without any liability for damages caused while moving this equipment.
5 - Magasin Trévi inc. shall not be responsible for any damages resulting from freezing and/or: any shifting of the pool caused by a high water table any debris falling in the water while removing the winter cover.
6 - Magasin Trévi inc. does not roll, fold or clean the winter cover
7 - The customer agrees to remove all debris from the winter cover before the opening

8 - The customer has to maintain his draining well with less than 18" of water until frost.
9 - Magasin Trévi inc. reserves the right to adjust applicable service charges in the event the technician should note any discrepancy between the size of pool described above and the actual size of your pool or any other supplementary service not mentioned.
